response.overview: Bristol Beats is an archive of Bristol’s new emerging artists: beating, grooving and paving the foundations of Bristol’s soundtrack. It is historical, grainy and experimental imagery, interviews, and ideas about Bristol as a city, its changing tunes and why these artists do what they do. The music is unbeatable, it holds memory, bite, fight and dance. It is history and hope.  This film features Getdown Services, Zoe Carr-Smith, Nat Oaks, Ok Ewan and The Freakshow
response.title: Bristol Beats
